note.p: Naval officer and wine merchant. Husband of Eleanor Robinson, and father of Charles John Robinson.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/672/10/13/18), 1851 (HO107/1494/821/17), 1861 (RG9/103/60/39)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 24 February 2016)
